attributes.action: Ban Smoking whilst driving a vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now illegal to use a mobile whilst driving a motor vehicle, but people can still light up and smoke,  again only using one hand to control the vehicle. Its time to also consider a ban on smoking whilst driving

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
